item.title: Amazing
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2

Nobody cares, he was banned anyways. Stop all these spam topics.

item.title: Amazing
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:403715”][quote author=Acrodox link=topic=500780.msg3663116#msg3663116 date=1310456219]

SO what? It isn’t that hard to get rep on here.

Seriously go the fuck away… Don’t like it don’t post…
[/quote]How does my post show any relevant " hating" of the topic, i was stating a fact, you could even say I was supporting the topic by pointing out how easy rep is to gain. Don’t try to talk down to me unless you know the facts. As stated in the other thread, if you have something personally wrong with me take it to the private message system.[/quote]

The only reason I think this statement is 100% bullshit is because by you capitalizing SO, your trying to talk down to me. And this statement was just a though up shitty excuse.

Read full topic

item.title: Amazing
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:8, topic:403715”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=500780.msg3663120#msg3663120 date=1310456491]

SO what? It isn’t that hard to get rep on here.

Seriously go the fuck away… Don’t like it don’t post…
[/quote]How does my post show any relevant " hating" of the topic, i was stating a fact, you could even say I was supporting the topic by pointing out how easy rep is to gain. Don’t try to talk down to me unless you know the facts. As stated in the other thread, if you have something personally wrong with me take it to the private message system.

I just don’t enjoy the negativity you seem to put out IMO. I think you just purposely try to comment on my posts to fuck around with me… you do it all the time.[/quote]
STOP IT!

Rep means absolutely NOTHING!

Read full topic

item.title: Amazing
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:8, topic:403715”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=500780.msg3663120#msg3663120 date=1310456491]

SO what? It isn’t that hard to get rep on here.

Seriously go the fuck away… Don’t like it don’t post…
[/quote]How does my post show any relevant " hating" of the topic, i was stating a fact, you could even say I was supporting the topic by pointing out how easy rep is to gain. Don’t try to talk down to me unless you know the facts. As stated in the other thread, if you have something personally wrong with me take it to the private message system.

I just don’t enjoy the negativity you seem to put out IMO. I think you just purposely try to comment on my posts to fuck around with me… you do it all the time.[/quote]I have one of these…personas that you have to get to know. Those who have me added on msn can tell you I can be one of the most hilarious people to talk to at times, at other times i can be the most odd person to talk. You just have to get to know me first. My trolls, what you call " hating" , and whatever negative you feel come from me trust me it really isn’t. I’m a pretty cool guy.

Read full topic
